text: @DineshDSouza @realDonaldTrump same as when gas mileage is advertised as 29 mpg but only under ideal conditions, actual gas mileage varies depending on driving style. So it really isn't 29mpg? So that death wasn't really caused by coronavirus? You either die from it or you don't. way to inflate numbers.
